Inner Engineering Total
Free Introductory Webinar

We are happy to announce that for the first time, Isha Singapore is introducing the 4-day in-person Inner Engineering program with brand new content.

Designed by Sadhguru and conducted by a trained teacher, this program includes all aspects of Inner Engineering and Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya and doesn't require any pre-requisite.


What is Inner Engineering?

Inner Engineering is a comprehensive system, derived from the ancient science of yoga, to establish a deep and lasting personal transformation. It is a method of aligning your body, mind, emotions and energies to function at their peak and in complete harmony.

The program includes Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya - a powerful 21-minute inner energy process that incorporates the breath; when practiced regularly, this 21-minute kriya can bring various benefits into one's life.

 
Program Details
 
March 9 (Thu) - March 12 (Sun), 2017

MDIS Queenstown, Samtas hall, 501 Stirling Rd, Singapore 148951

 

Register for early bird offer

  • On Thursday the session will begin with a Free Introductory Talk on Inner Engineering.
  • Please note that this program does not require Inner Engineering Online as a pre-requisite.
  • Open to anyone above 15 yrs of age.
